m_szDocTitle: Remote controlled robot system that provides medical images - Intouch Technologies, Inc.
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Remote controlled robot system that provides medical images United States Patent 8849679 Abstract: A remote controlled robot system that includes a mobile robot and a remote control station. The mobile robot is controlled by the remote control station and includes a robot monitor, and a robot camera that captures a robot image. The system also includes a medical image device that can be coupled to the robot. The remote control station includes a camera that captures a remote station image, and a monitor that displays the robot image captured by the robot camera
